clients.title: Make Sure Your Phone # is on Google My Business
description: Google has noted that 90% of people are more likely to interact with you when your phone number is on Google Maps and Search. Having a phone number on your Google My Business (GMB) profile can result in more leads for your firm. We recommend reviewing your GMB listing today! Get in touch with us if you find your phone number is missing or outdated.

jld.title: Compare & Save Feature In The Justia Lawyer Directory
description: Prospective clients can now compare and save attorney profiles while browsing the Justia Lawyer Directory. Be sure to make your directory profile as complete as possible by including your credentials, a high quality photo, peer & client reviews, payment options, contact information, and more, as prospective clients will use these new features to compare attorneys side-by-side.
